0: In another surprising 2012 plot twist, Ron Paul became the first Republican candidate to take on the new frontrunner Newt Gingrich today, releasing a scathing video that attacks Gingrich for "serial hypocrisy." NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The 150-second web spot is a dramatic — and very well-produced — mashup of Gingrich clips from over the years, including his cozy global warming ad with Democratic House leader Nancy Pelosi. It also features Gingrich's fight with House Budget Chair Paul Ryan and references his ties to mortgage giant Freddie Mac. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The message throughout is that Gingrich is happy to change his policy
